answers.answer: With my first born I had to retake it and the second time it came out fine. Just because it was high the first time doesn't mean you are diabetic. The second will determine if you are or not. Good luck.
I have to take my next week. not looking forward to that at all.
I have it take it again..but i have to be there for 3 hours

I failed my first test, went back for the 3hr test and failed it too.  I had gestational diabetes, but ended up controlling it with diet until the last 2 weeks, and had to take a pill once a day.  It really wasn't that bad, and the good news is, you get several ultrasounds.  He is now a healthy 8 year old boy, and never had any problems.  My next son, I passed the test fine:)  I'm 8 weeks with my 3rd , so we'll see!  Either way, you will be fine:)

question: My dr called....he said i need to retake mt Glucose..cuz it came high...so that mean i have diabetes????
title: so scared
